content: Co(CH3COO)2·H2O (0.04 g, 0.2 mmol), btp (0.018 g, 0.1 mmol), GeO2 (0.01 g, 0.1 mmol), Na2MoO4·2H2O (0.242 g, 1 mmol) were mixed in 10 mL water and adjusted pH value to about 5. The solution is then placed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel reaction kettle with a capacity of 18 ml. The reactants in the Teflon-lined stainless steel reaction kettle was heated at 170 °C for 5 days, and then cooled to room temperature naturally. Red brown crystals of 1 were obtained by 42% yield. Anal. Calcd for C42H60Co2GeMo12N36O40 (Mr = 3051): C, 16.53; H, 1.98; N, 16.53; Co, 3.86; Mo, 37.74%. Found: C, 16.56; H, 1.90; N, 16.56; Co, 3.88; Mo, 37.78%. IR data (KBr, cm−1): 3398(m), 3129(s), 2363(m), 1627(s), 1527(s), 1447(m), 1393(w), 1283(s), 1214(m), 1132(s), 1000(w), 950(s), 874(s), 776(m), 768(s), 673(m), 505(m).
clean_text:
Synthesis

Co(CH3COO)2⋅H2O (0.04 g, 0.2 mmol), btp (0.018 g, 0.1 mmol), GeO2 (0.01 g, 0.1 mmol), Na2MoO4⋅2H2O (0.242 g, 1 mmol) were mixed in 10 mL water and adjusted pH value to about 5. The solution is then placed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel reaction kettle with a capacity of 18 ml. The reactants in the Teflon-lined stainless steel reaction kettle was heated at 170 °C for 5 days, and then cooled to room temperature naturally. Red brown crystals of 1 were obtained by 42% yield. Anal. Calcd for C42H60Co2GeMo12N36O40 (Mr = 3051): C, 16.53; H, 1.98; N, 16.53; Co, 3.86; Mo, 37.74%. Found: C, 16.56; H, 1.90; N, 16.56; Co, 3.88; Mo, 37.78%. IR data (KBr, cm-1): 3398(m), 3129(s), 2363(m), 1627(s), 1527(s), 1447(m), 1393(w), 1283(s), 1214(m), 1132(s), 1000(w), 950(s), 874(s), 776(m), 768(s), 673(m), 505(m).
